hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Water Temple#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found #outside Ganon's Castle#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Spirit Temple# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #0# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: When the moon hits Termina like a big pizza pie that's game over.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.
